entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using System.Text.Json, IAsynEnumerable, and source generation together doesn't work #58221
  • Improve Stream for .NET 7 #58216
    7.0.0
  • Some non-shipping packages in runtime have stable versions #58214
    6.0.0
  • emsdk should place stable versioned blobs in a non-stable dir #58213
  • Remove `!` from `Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing` #58211
  • System.Security.Principal.Windows outerloop tests fail if run as non-admin #58207
    7.0.0
  • IAsyncEnumberable should stop synchronous iterating after cancellation #58205
  • Attempting to JIT compile method in System.Test.Json tests on iOS devices #58204
    6.0.0
  • ManagedWebSocket and multiple reads and writes #58202
  • There are missing and mismatching cultures between .net and the os #58200
  • System.Text.Json code gen: collision when two classes share same name but different namespaces #58198
  • [Linux/x86] GenericPInvokeCalliHelper problem #58191
  • Mono: handle structs larger than 256 bytes correctly #58190
    6.0.0
  • .NET 6: Interop.AppleCrypto.GetRandomBytes fails on all iOS Devices #58185
    6.0.0
  • Does COMPlus_Thread_UseAllCpuGroups has an effect on NUMA cores? #58184
  • Crossgen2 fails with null reference exception. #58181
  • Regression in SocketsHttpHandler when establishing connection with Negotiate #58179
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests hardcode the AssemblyVersion #58175
    6.0.0
  • Question about System.MissingMethodException: Method not found #58173
  • .net core 5 console app crashes #58172
  • "Clean up old artifacts owned by root" installer CI step failing #58168
  • Let roslyn generate reference assemblies from source projects and remove reference projects #58163
    7.0.0
  • Implement new generic math operator interfaces in System.Numeric types #58162
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests remove the *emsdk* run #58159
    7.0.0
  • Using GetEnvironmentVariables wipes all envvars #58156
    6.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow take underlying array from a List<T> #58153
  • Test failure ThreadPoolBoundHandleTests.MultipleOperationsOverSingleHandle_CompletedWorkItemCountTest #58151

Closed

  • MAUI iOS App Store rejection: App references non-public symbols _FSEventStreamCreate #57931
    6.0.0
  • Some tests for overflow checking operations are disabled on Mono #51323
    7.0.0
  • [WASM] Chrome timer throttling affects runtime #51041
    6.0.0
  • Save core_root after helix submission for coreclr jobs. #36398
    Future
  • Generate CORE_ROOT failing for linux_musl arm/arm64 #55657
    6.0.0
  • JIT.Regression.CLR-x86-JIT.V1-M09-M11 failed on Android x64 in the CI #56656
    7.0.0
  • Linux createdump (via dotnet-dump collect) segfaults in DAC taking a heap dump #57871
  • System.Text.Json code generator: cannot convert from 'System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonWriter' to 'System.IO.Stream' #58118
  • VS2022 debuger crashes when reading HTTP Response Object response.Content.ReadAsStringAsync(); #57949
    6.0.0
  • [Arm64]: Regression in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.TimeToFirstService #58189
  • Make use of ports in SPN optional #57818
    5.0.x
  • AppleCryptoNative_SslSetEnabledCipherSuites is likely broken on Mac Catalyst x64 #53120
    6.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'false' in src/coreclr/jit/earlyprop.cpp Line: 199 #57774
    7.0.0
  • STJ Source Generator bloats the assembly when used with records #58136
  • Symbols for crossgen2 are not indexed #57542
    6.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'm_compGenTreeID == m_compiler->compGenTreeID' #57775
    7.0.0
  • Generating CORE_ROOT fails on linux-musl-arm and linux-musl-arm64 #57958

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement support for passing a .env file to corerun to easily set environment variables for stress testing. #58222
    area-Host
  • Replacement tokens in logging test baseline files #58220
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Delete dead code in AppDomain #58219
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix frequent FuncEval abort upon hitting a breakpoint in an ASP.NET Core web app #58218
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Fix frequent FuncEval abort upon hitting a breakpoint in an ASP.NET Core web app #58217
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mini] Dynamically allocate a buffer for large runtime invoke results #58215
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Handle shadowed property names in DiagnosticsSourceEventSource #58212
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 6.0.0
  • [libraries] Skip System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs PNSE, System.Diagnostics.Tracing and System.Runtime.Extensions test #58210
    area-System.Security
  • Remove usage of [AggressiveOptimization] #58209
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-build-performance, 7.0.0
  • Update CompatibilitySuppressions after updating APICompat that uses references #58208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [MonoVM] Report original DLL name when P/Invoke lookup fails #58206
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [mono] Fix regression introduced by PR 55726 #58201
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][wasm] WebSocket improve send buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Add test that GetCustomAttribute returns string.Empty #58197
    area-System.Reflection
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] [mono] Replace -disable-fp-elim with -frame-pointer=all #58195
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #58194
    area-codeflow
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add Crossgen2 symbol files to package #58193
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono] Replace -disable-fp-elim with -frame-pointer=all #58192
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • #58181 Fix NullReferenceException in crossgen2. #58183
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-rc1] [MacCatalyst] Make AppleCryptoNative_SslSetEnabledCipherSuites check for 32 bit & 16 bit SSLCipherSuite #58182
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, os-maccatalyst, 6.0.0
  • Fix trim_youngest_desired #58180
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Make bashing to constants nicer #58171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix memory leak in enqueue/dequeue of EventPipe callback data. #58170
    area-Tracing-coreclr, area-Tracing-mono
  • Optimize DateTimeOffset #58169
    community-contribution
  • File.*AllText* optimizations #58167
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix ep_rt_atomic_compare_exchange_size_t in Mono EventPipe shim. #58164
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Implement Environment.GetEnvironmentVariables for Apple platforms using official API #58161
    area-PAL-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Prevent AV in processinfo2 while suspended on Mono. #58158
    area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.0
  • Check Options validations length instead of null #58157
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Improve FileProviders.Physical tests to reuse existing helper types #58155
    test enhancement, area-Extensions-FileSystem, 7.0.0
  • A few more regex test #58154
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm] Require workloads if using `@(NativeFileReference)` #58152
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.0

Merged

  • Remove NDIRECTSTUB_FL_TRIGGERCCTOR (never set) #58203
    area-Interop-coreclr, auto-merge, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Fix a few corner case overflow operations #58114
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Handle shadowed property names in DiagnosticsSourceEventSource #58145
    area-System.Diagnostics, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] PhysicalFileProvider: Use active polling instead of FileSystemWatcher on iOS/tvOS #58165
    Servicing-approved, os-ios, area-Extensions-FileSystem, 6.0.0
  • Use OutputRid in test projects #58166
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Surface allocations per thread #58123
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [mono] Fix whitespace (inconsistent spaces -> tabs) #58186
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Fix framework references on Mac Catalyst #58187
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc1] X86 Debug Stack offsets are encoded divided by 4 #58094
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] [wasm] spread WS based timers over next 6 minutes to prevent heavy throttling #58160
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • PhysicalFileProvider: Use active polling instead of FileSystemWatcher on iOS/tvOS #58142
    area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #58034
    area-codeflow
  • Minor R2RTest improvements #58144
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix trigger paths for perf_slow.yml #58079
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add Crossgen2 symbol files to package #58143
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix codegen on ARM in NativeAOT #57948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [MacCatalyst] Make AppleCryptoNative_SslSetEnabledCipherSuites check for 32 bit & 16 bit SSLCipherSuite #57623
    area-System.Security
  • remove useless '()' in the constructor for 'Stack' #58174
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Don't consider classes that do not have any attributes or base classes #58004
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Propagate BBF flags during hoisting #57825
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] spread WS based timers over next 6 minutes to prevent heavy throttling #57745
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix madeChanges in fgInline #57782
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Prevent AV in processinfo2 while suspended on Mono. #58099
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Stop compiling armel variant of standalone jit as the unix arm jit covers that scenario #58140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Improve tracing of HTTP/2 PINGs #57930
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Remove NDIRECTSTUB_FL_NGENEDSTUB (never set) #58146
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Remove MethodDesc::IsRestored (always true) #58126
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fail early on CMake check failure when building coreclr #58133
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove HasNativeImage and family since it always returns false now. #57984
    area-Interop-coreclr, auto-merge, 7.0.0
  • Update mono version string to 7.0.0 #58150

Updated

  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix VN incorrect optimizations with a new JitEEInterface function. #58005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Migrate LoggerMessageGenerator to IIncrementalGenerator #58068
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Make JsonGenerator be an incremental generator #57088
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Request fewer threads in the thread pool #57885
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Fix `ThreadPool.SetMinThreads` and `SetMaxThreads` to return false when they don't override the preconfigured value #57699
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [Group 1] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing` #57398
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add internal junction support to link APIs #57996
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • [Group 1] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` #57445
    area-DependencyModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.EnvironmentVariables` #57433
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use temporary ni.dll.tmp files with crossgen2 pipeline mode in order to not interfere with crossgen2 itself #57341
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.CommandLine` #57432
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder` #57418
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.0
  • Refactor subrange assertion generation and propagation #55186
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, Future
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration` #57414
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Tls resume PoC (server stateless) #57079
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Leverage `cwde` and `cdqe` for sign extensions on xarch #56172
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix GetGenerationBounds under USE_REGIONS #57101
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement `GT_MUL_LONG` for ARM64 #57926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Abstractions` #57401
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Allow RuntimeType arguments in CustomAttributeBuilder #58020
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono] Support RuntimeType.MakeGenericType with non-RuntimeType elements #58014
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution
  • Spannified internals of BigInteger #35565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • [WASM] Enabled strict mode on all JS files #54011
    arch-wasm
  • [libraries] Skip test suites crashing on CI for iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst #57208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-maccatalyst
  • Initial document for JIT and GC stress usage #58147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Future
  • [mono] Support public key token in DefineDynamicAssembly #58016
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Don't blank out SpecialFolders on Android if they don't already exist #58064
  • [wasm] Tracking aot failures, not meant to be merged #52004
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm
  • Upgrade to net7.0 and remove target frameworks #58011
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove two async state machines for typical HTTP/1.1 request path #58092
    area-System.Net.Http, tenet-performance, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Bring back System.Security.AccessControl package #57816
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Enable win registry install location for all architectures #57851
    Servicing-consider, area-Host
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Give tvOS a special value for Personal/MyDocuments #58056
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime, os-tvos
  • Re-enable Vector3DistanceTest #57077
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Use string.Empty for empty string custom arg values #58113
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Increase some of the DnsEndPointTest timeouts #58129
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Fix x86 linux tests #57244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use CustomCommand to run runtime tests for mobile targets on helix #57292
    area-Infrastructure
  • Socket: check connect result when non-blocking connect completes. #57756
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Run runtime tests marked as JitOptimizationSensitive on Mono. #58106
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Convert Interlocked intrinsics to NamedIntrinsics #55170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add more stress-testing for Inliner #57691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Enable runtime tests with closed issues #57720
    increase-code-coverage
  • [Stress] Enable POST by disabling InternalServerError suppression #58110
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0] Conditionally build allconfigurations in source-build #58122
    area-Infrastructure
  • Share compiler configurations across libs & coreclr #58096
    community-contribution
  • Use IndexOf to find value for smaller enums #57973

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Seg fault on empty ARM application #1463

Closed

  • ARM Empty application crashed. #1426
  • ARM missing RhpStackProbe #1458

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable COM specific marshalers on Unix #1464
  • Collection tests for dfa #1462
  • Update LLVM 5.0 -> 12.0 #1461
    area-NativeAOT

Merged

  • Fix name of the RhpStackProbe #1460
  • Add RhpStackProbe for ARM #1459

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [6.0.1xx-RC1] Add platform support to workload pack records #20202
  • dotnet pack command results in the loss of digital signature #20197
  • .NET stack temporary folder cannot be accessed after running under sudo #20195
  • "dotnet build-server shutdown" equivalent for SharedCompilationId and -pipename? #20183
  • String interpolation errors when concatenating multiple string #20178

Closed

  • Create a single bundle for x86 and x64 windows installer #5237
    5.0.1xx
  • dotnet run: application exception causes "dotnet has stopped working" error dialog #6707
    5.0.1xx
  • WhenToolAssetsFileIsInUseThenCLIRetriesLaunchingTheCommandForAtLeastOneSecond test is flaky #8002
    5.0.1xx
  • Help is wrong for some commands #9181
    5.0.1xx
  • Disable building/running test in official build of sdk in 5.0 #10771
  • .NET Core SDK 3.1.300-preview-015048 breaks build with multi targeting #10905
  • Update NETSDK1130 error to recommend installing CSWinRT NuGet package #13268
    5.0.1xx
  • /Users/USERNAME/.dotnet/sdk-advertising-temp/ cannot be accessed #19523
    6.0.1xx
  • dotnet workload install creates .nuget with root permissions in clean env #19823
    6.0.1xx
  • Workload repair without any installed workloads should be a no-op #20092
    6.0.1xx
  • Can't find System.Private.DataSerialization.resources #20189
  • Unable to reference Net5.0 C# project from Net5.0 C++ project #20002
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Update global.json #20212
  • Prkrishn/add tests #20209
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Add VisualStudioComponentIds metadata for suggested workloads #20200
    Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Fix missing packaged shim after update #20199
    Area-Workloads
  • Do not show help on internal workload error #20163
    Area-Workloads
  • Add sudo home override #20196
    Area-Workloads
  • [RC1] port [Package Validation] resolve references when running API Compat #20152
    Servicing-approved, Area-Compatibility
  • [Release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Dispose Open handle on the produced package #20156
    Servicing-approved, Area-Compatibility
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Avoid signing and generating unnecessary packages #20082
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding sdk check config file #19904
    source-build, Area-CLI
  • Improve command output for no op workload repair #20164
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Update a bunch of test projects to the current target framework #20148
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [WIP] Support installing workloads in user folder #18823
    Area-Workloads
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Arch-independent support for `dotnet run` #20102
    Area-External, Servicing-approved
  • Project Reference support for WinRT Components #20153
    Area-External, Servicing-approved

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • StringBuilder with Interpolated String is malformatted #55927
  • Report warning for implicit conversion of method group to `object` #55923
    17.0
  • Ruleset setting takes precedence over .editorconfig #55920
  • `T ?? null` could be lowered to `T` where `T` is a reference type #55919
  • Type inference with method groups does not support variance for signatures with ref parameters #55909

Closed

  • ERROR: InsertNodesBefore: The item specified is not the element of a list (Only with ExpressionSyntax) #55932
  • 'Extract interface' refactoring should follow 'using directive placement' code style #39786
    Backlog
  • Extract Base Class puts usings in the wrong spot when usings inside namespace #55746
    17.0
  • How to get some nodes like the Roslyn syntax visualizer in Visual Studio? #55376
    17.0
  • Cannot find Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.dll -- for some people in the same build system #53656
    17.0
  • Can Roslyn Analyzers be used to analyze .NET Framework (4.8)? #55435
    17.0
  • Remove LangVer=Preview restriction from `CSharpGeneratorDriver` #54373
    17.0
  • Move to type to file duplicates attribute #55544
    17.0
  • Assert failure: Unexpected value 'LessDerived' of type 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.MemberResolutionKind' #52701
    17.0
  • Test plan for Global Using Directive feature #51307
    17.0
  • c# Incorrect var nullability #55917
  • Remove LangVersion=preview restriction from incremental source generators #55848
    17.0
  • "Enable full solution analysis" is not available via Quick Launch #16014
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce CSharpFormattingOptions2 .cctor IL size/JIT compile time #55935
    Area-IDE
  • Move more code to async gotodef helpers #55929
    Area-IDE
  • Implement SpillSequenceSpiller.VisitMakeRefOperator. #55928
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55925
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid calling DefineUserDefinedStateMachineHoistedLocal for fields without long-lived local slot. #55922
    Area-Compilers
  • Add ISymbol.MetadataToken #55913
    Area-Compilers
  • Freeze semantics for all branches when asked #55910
    Area-IDE
  • Add File.Exists check when renaming a file as part of InlineRename #55908
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously #55687
    Area-IDE
  • Fix support for "Usings inside namespaces" in various places #55795
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55930
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Don't consider syntax trees changed if the compilation is the same #55715
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Pass frozen document correctly #55911
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove top level attributes on MoveTypeToFile #55900
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add telemetry for reasons on why `TryApplyChanges` fails in a workspace #55901
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move Static Members: Refactor moved member references #55581
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • Include edit session runtime capabilities in telemetry data #55898
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Revert changes to analysis scope to make RPS happy #55924
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously - and use in 'add nuget reference' code action #55759
    Area-IDE
  • Adjust asserts in OverloadResolutionResult.ReportDiagnostics. #55899
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add IEditAndContinueSolutionProvider #55889
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55926
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Don't hold onto documents in 'Find' features #55635
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Extract async navigation portions of https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/55635 #55891
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Test GetSpeculativeAliasInfo for a global alias. #55897
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - GlobalUsingDirective, Next
  • Inline hints not updating immediately #55080
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55916
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55918
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55915
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove langver == preview restriction for incremental generators #55866
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55914
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55912
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Disabled diff margin in cocoa quickfix preview. #55882
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Set resources correctly on CopyRefAssembly #55893
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55907
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55906
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55936
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Warm up ImportCompletion cache in background when opening a document #55729
    Area-IDE
  • Experimentation options #55902
    Area-IDE
  • Source generators/timing #55892
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Use document with partial semantic for completion #55745
    Area-IDE
  • Track duplicate hintNames as they are added #55905
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Enable VSTHRD200 (Use 'Async' suffix for async methods) #51812
    Area-IDE
  • Add an option to let user could change the position of Inheritance Margin #55674
    Area-IDE
  • Track completion of ProjectCacheService operations #47902
    Area-IDE
  • Use lambda expression and method group signature in type inference #55786
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Hold onto the TextBufferContainer for a ITextBuffer weakly #53245
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Use Auto Prop analyzer bails out for all attributes #55872
    Area-IDE
  • Lazily evaluate the root node for syntax trees #55716
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Moving WinForms Editor Factory logic to WinForms #55870
    Area-IDE
  • EnC - Report rude edit when a user adds an AsyncMethodBuild attribute #55877
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC
  • Ensure synthesized attribute definitions are emitted for lambda and local function signatures #55873
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow fully oblivious types to coexist with nullable-aware base types in partial classes #55861
    Area-Compilers
  • Show destination name #55650
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • Move the bulk of the work for rename after apply to be off the UI thread #55878
    Area-IDE
  • Initial implementation of raw string literals #54789
    Area-Compilers
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Trigger refactoring if the cursor is put on single field or event syntax node #55523
    Area-IDE
  • BoundIncrementOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #54466
    Area-Compilers
  • Add new high memory events for releasing Roslyn caches #54850
    Area-IDE
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Use bulk unsubscribe operations in FileChangeWatcher #55890
    Area-Compilers
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE
  • EnC - Tests for lambda improvements #55224
    Area-Interactive
  • Add generator driver cache to VBCSCompiler #55023
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Implement metadata reference provider #55052
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Correctly disposing HttpResponseMessage #35806
  • HTTP/3: Support client certificates on non-Windows platforms #35800
  • `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.ProjectSystem.DefaultProjectSnapshotManager` Causing Large Amount of `System.Reactive` Components in Memory #35797
    17.0-Preview4
  • restore.cmd fails if environment variable "projects" defined #35796
  • Blazor Webassembly (standalone) does not work with v2.0 endpoints #35794
  • Port dotnet-run's DOTNET_ROOT changes to dotnet-watch #35793
  • Startup improvement: updates #35790
  • Perf regression: fortunes #35789
  • `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.Workspaces.DefaultProjectSnapshotManagerDispatcher+ProjectSnapshotManagerTaskScheduler` Generates 10GB Retention #35787
    17.0-Preview4
  • Configure of WebHostBuider is not called if UseStartup is also used #35781
  • Generic inherits breaks smart indentation #35780
    17.0-Preview4
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, .NET 6, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 6, aspnetcore #aspnetcore-104221-.NET6 #35776
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, aspnetcore, .NET 6 RC 1, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 6 RC 1 #aspnetcore-104199-.NET6RC1 #35775
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, aspnetcore, .NET 7, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 7 #aspnetcore-104050-.NET7 #35774
  • [debugger][blazor webassembly] Breakpoints on server not hit #35773
  • Access IIS SiteName at configuration time (without HttpContext) #35772
  • HttpClient from WebApplicationFactory returns "415 Unsupported Media Type" on HttpMethod.PATCH #35770
  • dotnet-openapi refresh does not truncate json documents. #35767
  • JwtBearerHandler logs JWT exceptions as "Error" even if it recovers. Suggesting "Debug" #35766
    Discussions
  • Fixer/Analyzer: Suggest removing superfluous binding attributes #35762
  • Fixer/Analyzer: Suggest the use of the Results class to produce responses instead of manually writing to the HttpResponse #35761
  • Fixer/Analyzer: Add code fixer to suggest using parameter binding instead of manual parsing of HttpContext/HttpRequest #35760
  • Fixer/Analyzer: Remove UseEndpoints() and hoist route registrations top level to WebApplication #35759
  • Add ParameterInfo argument to BindAsync and return specific type instead of object #35748
    6.0-rc1

Closed

  • Wrong formatting within nested InputSelect component #35604
  • `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.ProjectSystem.DefaultProjectSnapshotManager` Causing Large Amount of `System.Reactive` Components in Memory #35451
    17.0-Preview4
  • Add Api Parameter Description to Api Description to represent the request body #35421
    6.0-rc2
  • Support Blazor properly for All ASP.Net Identity Scaffolded pages (i.e., not Razor Pages) #35551
  • Startup improvement: fortunes_dapper #35739
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json, json_nodejs, plaintext #35625
  • Missing test coverage in WebApplicationBuilder #35423
    6.0-rc2
  • Blazor .NET 5.0.3 service-worker.published.js broken #30543
    6.0-rc1
  • Publish WebAssembly project with library which uses static assets failed #34989
    6.0-rc1
  • Closing and re-opening Razor projects can result in Debug.Assert failures #35751
    17.0-Preview4
  • Hosted blazor wasm coped css bundling bug #33580
    6.0-rc2
  • Not working Blazor server template without HTTPS #34334
  • Blazor WebAssembly fails with error loading blazor-hotreload.js when running in VS debugger #34962
  • [SPA] Update templates to use a port range in the frontend proxy #35130
    6.0-rc1
  • Can't create a React + .NET Core App #34892
    6.0-rc2
  • How to pass a complex parameter to a component in razor markup #35771
  • Need help with my account #35487
  • Throw informative exception when Input Controls are not surrounded by EditForm #27804
    6.0-rc2
  • Default Validation Errors in API (.NET 6 Preview 7) #35746
  • ConnectionState.getNextInvocationId() on a null object reference #35444

PullRequests

Created

  • Add an analyzer that warns about non-literal sequence numbers #35805
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] HTTP/3: Skip client certificate tests on non-Windows #35804
    area-runtime
  • HTTP/3: Skip client certificate tests on non-Windows #35803
    area-runtime
  • Stop Serializing `InvokeVoidAsync` Return Value #35799
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add API parameter description to API description to represent the request body - 35421 #35798
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add ParameterInfo argument to BindAsync and return specific type instead of object #35795
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add ParameterInfo argument to BindAsync and return specific type instead of object #35791
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Added coverage for developer exception page #35786
    area-runtime, tell-mode
  • [SPA] Add tests to ensure we don't break the SPA templates when making template changes #35783
    area-mvc
  • Add analyzer for detecting misplaced attributes on delegates #35779
    area-web-frameworks
  • [Blazor] Applies API review feedback and removes byte array APIs from the public API surface #35768
    area-blazor
  • HTTP/3: Server cancellation and abort exceptions consistency #35764
    area-runtime
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `dc078f5` to `7c21773` #35756
    area-infrastructure
  • Startup analyzers work for minimal apps #35747
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Exception when trying to run Optimize-DbContext #25738
  • Query/InMemory: projecting (int?)(myBaseEntity as MyDerivedEntity).IntOnDerived defaults to 0 rather than null #25735
  • Runtime Exception when passing Func<Entity, bool> into Filtered Include #25733
  • Performance issue when using multiple includes and QueryFilters #25731
  • Scaffolding leads to System.ArgumentNullException: Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'column') #25729
  • MigrationsAssembly path not working #25725
  • AddDbContext Split ModelBuilders in a Shared Project #25724

Closed

  • MigrationBuilder generates wrong foreign key target #23989
  • Relational: IS (NOT) NULL requires parenthesis when not in left side of an equality #23990
    6.0.0
  • Cosmos : persist Guids as strings by default??? #25726
  • Scaffold tool can create an inverse property with a similar name to a column property and get confused #25292
    6.0.0
  • [dotnet counters] Query Cache Hit Rate (%) is NaN #25142
    6.0.0
  • Cosmos Provider - Date in Primary Key cannot be later deleted #25100
    6.0.0
  • Different orders of Include()/Where() in queries produce different results #24953
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Missing ORDER BY #25696

PullRequests

Created

  • Configure ambiguous navigations with RequiredAttribute #25737
    auto-merge
  • Adding some regression tests for issues fixed earlier #25736
  • Metadata: Avoid sharing default mappings for entity types #25734
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw to 2.0.5 #25730
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25723
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Fix to #23990 - Relational: IS (NOT) NULL requires parenthesis when not in left side of an equality #25722
  • Metadata: Find inverse property navigation case sensitive first #25714
  • Return -1 for no data in query cache event counter #25727
    auto-merge
  • Cosmos: Escape invalid characters in the id value #25721
    breaking-change
  • More links to conceptual docs #25697
  • Reenable previously flaky Union_non_entity #25705
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25707
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix to #24953 - Different orders of Include()/Where() in queries produce different results #25716

Updated

  • Detatching principal keeps track of unreferenced dependents #25702
